name: Here They Come
description:
Here They Come

Protype project for a Top-Down-Shooter.

Controls:

  • Look: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left mouse button
  • Movement: WSAD

Native Resolution: 1920 x 1080

Used Assets:

  • Blocky Characters (+ 8 skins) by  Kenney Vleugels (Kenney.nl) and Casper Jorissen (Kenney.nl)
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/colossal-game-music...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footstep-and-foley-so...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/weapons/gun-explosion-sound...
